location.sjis: ディックル村 釣り人の池

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: 武器を取りに来たのか？
portrait_l.ascii: Have you come to take a weapon?

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: 武器を預けに来たのか？
portrait_l.ascii: Have you come to deposit a weapon?

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: 預けられそうな武器が無いぞ
portrait_l.ascii: You have no weapons that can be deposited.
